summary: Added new Tasks documentation and improved TodoWrite reliability with better state persistence

wizard_impact.description: TodoWrite now persists state across sessions, making task tracking more reliable
wizard_impact.suggested_action: Update SDLC.md to reference new persistence behavior, verify hooks still work

reasoning: This release directly improves TodoWrite which is core to our SDLC enforcement. The persistence changes mean our task tracking will be more reliable. HIGH relevance because it touches core wizard functionality.
